body.title: St Floor Wingate House
body.description: Watch the ferry come and go in this custom waterfront 2 story home with an enchanting Puget Sound and Mountain views. Artistic, well built, private 2 Bedroom and Den. Skylights, vaulted high ceilings, big windows maximize water views & natural light. Wood crafted spiral staircase to lower level southwestern style family room. Stucco Fireplace surround & terracotta. Beautiful wood deck recently added. Wood sided, metal roof for easy care. Private yard, sunny garden space, quality landscaping & shared beach access. Square Footage is 2,078 and lot is 22,651 SF. It is 2 bedroom plus den and 2 bathrooms.
